alert.note: Alert for Lassen-Eastern Plumas-Eastern Sierra Counties (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 13 at 1:46PM PST until January 14 at 1:00AM PST by NWS Reno
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Wet snow. Snow accumulations up to two inches mainly for areas above 6000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph, locally stronger along Highway 395 between Susanville and the NV state line. * WHERE...Lassen-Eastern Plumas-Eastern Sierra Counties. * WHEN...Until 1 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions across Yuba Pass. Very strong winds could cause damage to trees and power lines and be very dangerous to high profile vehicles along Highway 395.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
